gan - A sweater generator that uses artificial intelligence to create custom designs based on user preferences.
SweaterMorph - A mobile app that allows users to transform their existing sweaters into new and unique designs using augmented reality.
SweaterSwap - A platform that connects people to swap or sell their old sweaters to make room for new ones.
SweaterCycle - A program that encourages sustainable fashion by promoting the reuse and recycling of old sweaters.
SweaterUpgrade - A service that takes old sweaters and transforms them into high-quality, trendy pieces using eco-friendly materials and production methods.
